H0.text: Which racecourse, home to the King George VI steeplechase, is situated at Sunbury on Thames. Sandown Park

H1.text: Which racecourse, home to the King George VI steeplechase, is situated at Sunbury on Thames. Ascot

H2.text: Which racecourse, home to the King George VI steeplechase, is situated at Sunbury on Thames. Newbury

H3.text: Which racecourse, home to the King George VI steeplechase, is situated at Sunbury on Thames. Kemptonpark

A4.text: Kempton Park Racecourse is located in Sunbury-on-Thames, Surrey, England.

A5.text: The King George VI Chase takes place on Boxing Day at Kempton Park Racecourse.
